mapper.sql: id, statistics_month, source_type, recharge_population, recharge_amount, recharge_count, new_recharge_population, old_recharge_population, execute_time
mapper.delete: delete from month_recharge_report where statistics_month = #{statisticsMonth} and source_type = #{sourceType}
mapper.insert: insert into month_recharge_report (id, statistics_month, source_type, recharge_population, recharge_amount, recharge_count, new_recharge_population, old_recharge_population, execute_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statisticsMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{rechargePopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rechargeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newRechargePopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oldRechargePopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,
statistics_month,
source_type,
recharge_population,
recharge_amount,
recharge_count,
new_recharge_population,
old_recharge_population,
execute_time,

update month_recharge_report
statistics_month = #{statisticsMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_type = #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
recharge_population = #{rechargePopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
recharge_count = #{rechargeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
new_recharge_population = #{newRechargePopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
old_recharge_population = #{oldRechargePopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
execute_time = #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update month_recharge_report set statistics_month = #{statisticsMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_type = #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, recharge_population = #{rechargePopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recharge_count = #{rechargeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, new_recharge_population = #{newRechargePopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, old_recharge_population = #{oldRechargePopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, execute_time = #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
